Language.name: English
Language.String: A new support power is available to select
Repair or reinforce the selected units
More supplies generated for the base
Adds machinegun turret and gunner to warthogs.
Increases the attack and defense of your leader.
Upgrades this turrets attack and damage
Further upgrades this turrets attack and damage
Upgrades this turrets attack and damage
Further upgrades this turrets attack and damage
Improves Grunt infantry damage and defense
Improves Grunt infantry damage and defense
Modifies turret into an anti-infantry shade turret.
Modifies turret into an anti-air heavy needler turret.
Modifies turret into an anti-ground vehicle turret.
Upgrade supply depot to up supply production rate
Improves Brute chopper damage and defense
Improves Brute chopper damage and defense
Improves Brute infantry damage and defense
Improves Brute infantry damage and defense
Mainline troop, Slow and short range yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
Mainline troop, Slow and short range yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
Elite mainline troop, Slow and short range yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
Super soldiers, powerful mini-gun able to down infantry with ease. Their combat prowess inspires nearby infantry.
Mainline battle tank, good speed and range combine to make this a powerful ground vehicle.
Counter air vehicle, strong anti-air missile defense systems to defeat enemy air power.
Mainline air unit, Hawk is a sophisticated laser armed attack craft.
Massive base assault aircraft, Vultures have devestating missile attacks against buildings and units.
Mainline troop, Slow and short range yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
Speciality troops, wielding plasma swords and using cloaks these units are best tearing infantry apart from surprise.
Specialty troops, heavy infantry with powerful brute guns, these squads are high damage against vehicles
Counter infantry unit, armed with long range sniper rifles jackals can make quick work of enemy infantry.
Counter vehicle unit, powerful fuel rod cannons are a credible threat even against tanks.
Leader of the covenant forces, the arbiter is equiped with cloaking and dual plasma swords. Nearby friendly units fight harder for the Arbiter.
Mainline battle tank, good speed and excellent range combine to make this a powerful ground vehicle.
Massive base assault vehicle, Scarabs have a devestating beam attack able to tear bases apart..
Mainline air unit, Banshees are armed with both plasma cannons and fuel rod cannons.
Counter air aircraft, heavy needler turret can track and engagre enemy air in a large area.
Counter infantry unit, heavy protective armor allows them to close and burn the enemy.
Counter building vehicle, very slow and best set to destroying unprotected enemy bases.
Counter vehicle unit, large cannon does massive damage against enemy vehicles, and can lock down for extended range.
Massive super tank, good speed and improved range combine to make this the most powerful UNSC ground vehicle available.
Select an area for repair and reinforcements to arrive at.
Transport selected units to a targeted destination.
Drops an ODST squad at target location.
Transport selected units to a targeted destination.
Select an area to call in a strike from the Spirit of Fire!
Select an area to bomb with a shortsword bomber.
Launch a nuklear missile at a targeted location, the area after the strike will become deadly to infantry.
Select an area for the mega turret to fire on.
Select a location to lay a mine field.
Rhino locks down increasing range and damage.
Long range beam attack that does bonus damage against buildings.
Unique unit -coming soon-, Super Unit: ODST
Unique unit Mark 1 suits, Super Unit: Grizzly
Unique unit: -coming soon-, Super Unit: Hawk
Unique unit Elite commando\nLeader powers Glassing and Shields
Unique units Brutes, Brute choppers\nLeader powers Glassing and Shields
Basic unsc with no leader bonuses. *for testing purposes only*
Basic covenant with no leader bonuses. *for testing purposes only*
New units will move to this location by default when they are built.
Generates the energy needed by many buildings, upgrades and units. Note that advanced units and upgrades mey require multiple reactors.
Generates Supplies that can be used to deploy units, build buildings, and provide upgrades.
Generates Supplies that can be used to deploy units, build buildings, and provide upgrades.
Generates Supplies that can be used to deploy units, build buildings, and provide upgrades.
Generates the energy needed by many buildings, upgrades and units. Note that advanced units and upgrades mey require multiple reactors.
Air unit with a standard forerunner beam weapon
Covenant law mandates that the proper number of monuments be built before certain buildings, upgrades or units can be deplyed.
Use the sockets to build extractors and turrets
Use the sockets to build energy extractors and turrets
Use the sockets to build energy extractors and turrets
Use the sockets to build supply extractors and turrets
Use the sockets to build supply extractors and turrets
Use infantry to capture this site which can be used to produce supplies
Use infantry to capture this site which can be used to produce power
Attack this site to force it back to neutral
Send resources to other a teammate.
Follow Smoke Flares to Alpha Base
Pick up Forge at his wrecked Warthog
Use Mac Cannon on Remaining Covenant
Mainline air unit, Hornets are armed with both a gatling cannon and explosive rockets.
Use a tactical missile to destroy the enemy laser.
Destroy all enemy aircraft attacking the Spirit of Fire
Destroy the armor plating over the anti-grav engine compartment.
Deploy ODSTs into the antigrav engine compartment.
Provide protection for the Evacuation of Arcadia Colony
Get a base up and running
Expand to Fire Base Alpha and Bravo
At least one Transport needs to clear the planet safely
Get Bravo Platoon to the Landing Zone
Save the Spirit of Fire's ground forces from a grisly death
The Spirit of Fire is being drawn against her will into the belly of a hostile planet. Ground forces deployed to the planet's surface will be abandoned if the Spirit of Fire doesn't act quickly...
Free each Platoon by destroying the enemy base trapping it
Get Alpha Platoon to the Landing Zone
Drag the FTL Reactor Core Tractor up to the Space Elevator using Grizzly Tanks
Attach a Grizzly to the FTL Reactor Core Tractor
Use Orbital Bombardment on the Covenant or the [Flood]
Send a scout through the teleporter
Rescue the scout and secure the area
Kill the [Flood] and take control of the Covenant vehicles
Regroup and use the teleporter to secure the next area
Contain the [Flood] by closing off the vents
Use the teleporter to continue the UNSC advance
Take control of the abandoned Scarab
Get a Rhino to the marked location
Get the Rhino to the location Alpha and protect it
Place a Rhino at the marked Beta location
Transport a Rhino to the marked location Gamma
Lock-down Rhinos at the last 2 marked locations, Delta and Epsilon
Capture and Hold Whiskey Nuke Capabilityies
Take Spartan Team Omega to Camp
Escort Marines to Designated Defense Perimeters
Transports will only launch when full
Defend the Crater until help arrives.
Retreat to the Crater to the south.
Fast paced game play where taking the high ground \n may be the difference between life and death.
Players start in the four corners of the map and must defend two openings \n to their base while trying to control the resource heavy center of the map.
Battle inside the Relic, the side that comes out on top will control the Artifact below.
Fast paced gam eplay where taking the high ground \n may be the difference between life and death.
Two small ponds are located in the center of the map and \n controlling the cliff tops can be very advantageous
Large bodies of water leave narrow choke points \n between you and your enemies.
Barren lands leave few natural defenses for your base, \n and there is a node with many sockets located in the center.
02 - WHEN IS A DOOR NOT A DOOR <TEMPNAME>
12 - THAT'S GOING TO LEAVE A MARK
14 - DON'T WORRY, IT'S ONLY A BOMB
Distract the Flood Brain by attacking a Pod
Improves Mark 1 Suit damage and defense
Improves Mark 1 Suit damage and defense
Improves Mark 1 Suit damage and defense
Battle from platform to platform traversing space via your transport \n power losing air superiority may cost you the war
Improves Brute chopper damage and defense
Improves Flying artillery damage and defense
Improves Brute infantry damage and defense
Fight your way to Forge and Anders's location.
Increases energy rate at all monuments.
Increases energy rate at all monuments.
Increases energy rate at all monuments.
Take out all 3 Pods at the same time
Controlling the center may allow you to bombard your \n enemies with impunity
Enemies might be hiding around every corner on this map \n where large forerunner structures dominate the landscape
Improves flame marine damage and defense
Improves flame marine damage and defense
Improves flame marine damage and defense
Improves building armor and defensive turret damage
Improves building armor and defensive turret damage
Improves building armor and defensive turret damage
Improves infantry damage by cannons fired by scorpions, hawks, badger teams,and cannon turrets.
Improves vehicle damage by cannons fired by scorpions, hawks, badger teams,and cannon turrets.
Further reduces market and tribute penalty
Increases Energy production by 1/3 but decreases supplies production by 1/3
Machine gun bullets increased damage against aircraft
Extractors and turrets can be built here.
Only extractors can be built here.
A new base is cleared for placement here
Self Destruct building freeing the socket up.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades turret damage.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades turret damage.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades turret damage.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat end.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat end.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat end.
Increases the shields that captured nodes have when upgraded.
Increases the shields that captured nodes have when upgraded.
Further reduces market and tribute penalty
Battle over a node heavy center, although you can gain a major econ \n boost you can not build turrets there.
Clear the landing zone for Ander's Pelican
We're supposed to take that?! Lady, you're nuts.
You don't have to take the ramp. Yet.
Plus, I wouldn't put you down in the middle of all that.
Serina, bring the MAC online and give Omega team an LZ.
Let's see… disgusting alien body snatchers or sworn enemy of all humanity…
All right, the LZ is half clear.
All right, the LZ is half clear. And half… sticky.
Omega team, get down there and secure the LZ.
To secure this area we need to kill all [Flood] and capture the power node.
Hold off the Flood until your men can evac.
Increases vulture damage and defense and raises limit to 3
Urban warfare on a galactic scale, controlling the center paths may \n be difficult since you can not build on top of them
War has left very few structures intact on this piece of rock \n but its still our rock...
Battle around hot geysers on barren Harvest.
Brute choppers, and Brute tanks have increased trample damage *not active atm*
Brutes, Brute choppers, and Brute tanks train faster
Brutes, Brute choppers, and Brute tanks are cheaper
Brutes, Brute choppers and Brute tanks deal more damage against buildings.
Leader of the covnenant forces, has the ability to subvert enemy vehicles.
Get Charlie Platoon to the Landing Zone
Spirit of Fire is attempting to reactivate Alpha Base - Take troops to its location
The Covenant invasion of Arcadia is in full swing. Evacuation of its civilian population is the UNSC's top priority.
Landing on the surface of an unkonown planet, the crew must prepare for the worst
Place a Gremlin at the Pylon to Gain More Time
Anders has come up with a plan to stop the Covenant from getting their hands a devastating fleet of warships. There's only the small matter of establishing a beachhead...
Spirit of Fire's Engineers have unharness the FTL Reactor and strapped it to a flat bed. This needs to be pulled up the the Apex Site to be detonated.
Destroy as many enemy-held nodes as possible
If we can hold them at this river \n maybe we can keep them out of the city.
Frozen tundra leave few natural defenses for your base, \n but that means few for your enemies as well.
Use the Spartans to push forward and destroy the Covenant base.
Wisecracks aside, how long do we have, Serina?
Less than half an hour, Sir. Putting it on screen. Can I crack wise n--
Captain, I'm picking up the ground forces. Three platoons inbound. Plotting their approach vectors...
Sorry, I can't help you right now.
Give me a minute then I will help you.
Look what the enemy is doing... there.
Can you help me defend... here?
Can you help me attack... here?
I want to claim this node.
I am going to try to boom (focus on economy & techs).
I am going to try to turtle (focus on defenses).
I am going to try to rush (focus on military).
I am going to kick your ass with vehicles.
I am going to kick your ass with infantry.
I am going to kick your ass with air.
Enter the structure and destroy the detonator.
We've got Anders on a Pelican inbound. Clear the area.
If we can lure that Wraith tank near that methane refinery, we might destroy it with one shot!
Three Wraith Tanks are blocking our progress.
We've found some rocket launchers. Let's mount them onto our Warthogs.
Those Shade Turrets are deadly against our Warthogs.
Here are some reinforcement Warthogs for you.
Jackal snipers ahead! Get some hogs up here pronto!
Garrison marines into these crashed Pelicans for cover.
Let's get this outpost back online and expand our fighting force.
I'm not landing this Pelican while the area is crawing with Wraith! Take them out!
I've got some reinforcements incoming, clear the LZ!
They're rigging the place to blow!
Those hogs don't stand a chance against those turrets.
We're easy targets out here inthe open, get into cover now!
That cliff is crawling with Snipers!
We're getting nailed here by those snipers!
Taking out those barrels should take that genny out too.
I love it when they stand next to exploding barrels.
I'm betting those methane tanks make a pretty big boom whenthey explode.
It's some sort of energy shield, Serina, any suggestions?
We need to get to that structure!
That Wraith tank is going to be a problem for our Pelicans.
These Covenant energy barriers can be taken down by destroying the generators near them.
I'm picking up lots of Covenant chatter around your position, looks like they are setting up defenses.
Do whatever you can to stop the Covenant from detonating those devices.
Now we've reestablished Alpha Base we need to investigate what the Covenant are up to. Proceed north to the structure.
Lemme guess, bad guys in the way?
Boy, howdy. Serina, see if you can buy us more time. Sergeant, break through that line for our Pelicans.
This is Alpha Platoon, we've got hostile contacts. LOTS of hostile contacts.
This is Alpha Platoon, we can't hold our position much longer.
This is Alpha Platoon! We're being overrun!
This is Bravo Platoon. Sergeant, would you kindly get off your ass and save ours?!
This is Bravo Platoon. Get over here, man, we've lost one of the Wolverines!
But... but... I'm too pretty to go like this!
This is Charlie Platoon, we're burnin' em down fast as we can, Sergeant.
This is Charlie Platoon, they're really hitting us. We’ve lost one of the Scorpions!
This is it, men! Let's go out in a blaze of glory!
We're through! Pelican crews, start your run.
We're staying dirtside to give you a hand, Sergeant.
Sergeant, we'd like to help out.
Hey, thanks for that, Sergeant. How can we help?
Be a shame to waste all this fuel, eh, Sergeant?
<gasp> Aerial hostiles on an intercept course! Rescue flight, abort! Repeat, rescue flight, abort, abort!
This is Alpha Platoon, we're on our way. Save us a seat!
This is Bravo Platoon, we can hoof it. If we have to.
This is Charlie Platoon, we'll come in on our own. Keep those engines hot.
Captain, those pylons down there are generating the field we're in.
Forge, I'm sending you a new toy. A Gremlin. Drive it over to that pylon.
Gremlin? As in Anders' experimental Gremlins?
...and... we won't die quite so soon as before. Good work, Sergeant!
Use that Gremlin, Sergeant - I didn't send it down for your health. Well, sort of-- you take my meaning!
Kill these to free Alpha Platoon
Kill these to free Bravo Platoon
Kill these to free Charlie Platoon
Forge, I've spotted another pylon. Marking on your display.
To secure this area we need to kill all Covenant and capture the power node.
Whoa... I just read a slipspace signature. That's a teleporter!
I wonder where it goes. I'm coming down!
No. We need you up here to supervise the removal of the reactor core.
The ground forces can investigate this device. Carefully.
All right... there's another teleporter here. The Covenant are-- uh oh, I'm cut off.
Keep your head down, kid, we'll come to you.
Hey, look at those. You thinking what I'm thinking?
This location is alpha charlie. Repeat, location is alpha charlie. All threats neutralized.
The Covenant fled through this new teleporter.
We're through. The Covenant are still fleeing ahead of us.
But I'm getting antsy. This feels like a trap.
I've got a bad feeling about this...
Hey, look here. There are [Flood] emerging from that vent.
One firey lead bath, coming right up.
The humans are right behind us, Arbiter.
They are engaging the Flood. Should we leave them to it?
Absolutely not. Their ignorance of the Flood is as dangerous as the Flood itself.
Hit them. Hard. Before they doom us all.
Advance through at your earliest convenience, Omega team.
Good work! We're almost done here. One last area to secure. Make it happen!
So, that's where that scarab got to.
Hostiles at the ramp base are neutralized. We are ready to secure the area.
Pelican crews, prepare to land the reactor core.
The Covenant sure made a mess of Harvest, not to mention the weather.
Spirit of Fire is above you and the MAC is online.
The MAC uses power. You will need to capture a POWER NODE.
To fire the MAC press the Y button and select it from your COMMAND MENU.
You can't get range on those Jackal Snipers. It may be overkill but I've got an idea.
I'm detecting a UNSC Power Generator in your area. Keep an eye out for it..
With a marine squad selected command them to re-activate a UNSC by pressing X on the node.
Marines gather supplies. Select the squad and press the X button on the crate you want them to gather at.
Covenant sighted! Enemy at the gates.
I am detecting a significant Covenant force just over the ravine. Proceed with caution
The Covenant are pulling back. We won some ground but let's not put the kettle on just yet…
To gain access to the UNSC Turret Defense Systems we'll need to upgrade our base. Select the Command Center and press the X button to bring up the menu.
If you find yourself in excess of one resource or another. The Supply Pad can convert Supplies to Power or vice-versa.
Running a little low on power? Try upgrading our Power Generators . Add power extractors that will increase the supply to your base.
Kamikaze grunts. It had to be kamikaze grunts…...
Rapid firing of the MAC has overloaded is power banks. I'm on it , but will take a while for it to come back on line. Stay tuned.
A force to be rekoned with. Go get 'em.
This is Charlie Squad! We were shot down by unknown bogies. Hostiles have us pinned down. Requesting immediate assistance!!!
Plasma fire came out of nowhere, pilots are dead.
Why are they still here? We won this planet.
Thanks for the assist, we will follow you to Alpha Base.
This is inbound Pelican “Lucky Lucy”, we are taking fire from unknown locations, rear stabilizers been hit. We are in a spin
We are going down! Repeat, “Lucky Lucy” going down!
Hey! Over here! Those Shade Turrets have us pinned down.
Best hurry son, ammos running dry!
We have a Pelican down. Repeat. Pelican down!!! Need assistance!!!
When you here a hiss, that meant it's close. A crack means...GGAHHHH !!!
They're coming. They’ve got to be coming, right!!?? Where’s the rescue party?!!!
Hey! Over here! My squads pinned down! Follow me!
I thought this LZ wasn’t going to be hot! What do you call all this!!
Turrets! Man the 30’s!! ! Get some fire up between us and those crazy grunts!!
Turret One is down! We can’t hold them off forever, they’re blasting right through us!
Turret Two is offline! One turret can't hold them off for long.I hope you guys now what your doing back there!
UNSC Recon teams had a Forward Observation camp established to the NORHT EAST of this LZ. It has since gone derelict.
We need to get Alpha Base up and running again, and pave a clear path for Anders arrival. I don't want any surprises for her.
This as as close as the Pelicans can get to Alpha Base. Harvets wind gusts are proving to be too volatile.
To reactivate this base, we will need a Command Center, Supply Depot , Barracks and some basic defenses.
It is our hope that this is only due to Harvest atmosphere being heavily ionized by its glassing
Pelicans can’t get you any closer to Alpha Base due to bad weather conditions
You’ll have to hump it there gentlemen, I suggested you get started, we are losing daylight and its getting colder out there.
They are dug in, fighting till the end
Prepare a counter attack. Find where those guys are coming from and take it out!
We will never be able to get the Relic now. Prepare to nuke the sitefrom Orbit! Scorched earth policy aplies.
Cole Protocol applies. Spin up FTL. We’re leaving.
Spirit of Fire is sending down a Command Center and some Supply Depots. Once it’s set up make a Vehicle Depot and a Barracks from it.
Don't get distracted from our prime mission here, we need to get to Alpha Base and get it back online.
Anders needs to get down there, she can't get there till Alpha Base is up and running.

Forge here, Pelicans should have already departed Spirit of Fire but it seems radio transmission was lost shortly afterwards. Reason is unknown at this time. They may have been shot down for all we know. We will need to stay frosty.
New orders, pull those men out. I don't leave anyone behind. Get to getting!
We need some boots on the ground here. Barracks. Get on it.
Covenant are dug in pretty deep here. We need more marines!
Alpha's starting to be liveable now! We need to have access to Warthogs. Vehicle Depot. Get it done!
You’ll have to hump it here gentlemen, I suggested you get started, we are losing daylight and its getting colder out here.
Looks like they are pulling resources from that downed Covenant Cruiser, what are those? Anti Matter Bombs? I don't like this.
I love that part.Command Center is unpacked and plugged in!
A Home away from home. We need troops now. Barracks and Vehicle Depots. Get on it!
Up ahead,another downed Pelican, so much for this area being secure.
We need Alpha Base reactivated, you should be close now.
We can't lose Alpha. Covenant know we're close. Pick up the fight!!! You want to live forever?
Grab the tags and let's move on. We'll recover the bodies later.
You are going to have to build a large enough army to overpower those Covenant banging down our door. Get to training!
Though they are kept at bay for now, the balst doors won't hold forever.
Well, that’s it, they'll be coming through now. Stand ready.
Arcadia colony has several Launch pads, with civilian interstellar transports, these were mostly commerce and supply transportation but will suffice for large scale people movers
The civilians need to get off the planet immediately. Using these transports are our only option. Wait for a Transport to fill up, then select it and launch it. Get to it!
Don't launch too soon as we want as many evacuees as we can squeeze into one of these tins.
Don't want to launch too late either as a primed Transports is a huge red flashing target to the Covenant. The like those kind of things.
Launch sequence activated. Countdown commencing. Mark.

We need to get as many of these civilinas off Arcadia as we can. We have a very limited amount of time to do so. The Covenant are ammassing a large military force and are moving to our location . Save what you can and lets get out.
Civilians will get into the evac Transport on their own, all you need ot do is light the fuse
This Transport is full and ready. Light Fuse and get away!
That’s how it is done. Now get to it, a huge Covenat presence is amassing on the edge of Arcadia, we only have a small amouint of time to get all we can out of here.
Make sure those Transports are powered up, and safe from harm.
Transport has cleared the line. Evacuees have been resuced and acounted for.
I've gained access to Arcadia's Tranposrt launch grid, all you have to do is select a transport and the launch menu will come up.
I'm tracking Spirits inbound. Multiple targets, multiple trajectrories. These would be their reifnorcements.
Covenant armour inbound. They are stepping up this invasion of theirs.
I may be out of turn here, but you may want to hthink about getting something with more of a punch against those invaders.
Due to the sheer number of evacuees, it would take too long, plus we don’t have the resources for such a large scale EVAC.
Don't get too comfortable, comm station is coming back with large contacts inbound to your location. This can mean only one thing. Prepare for Covenant counter attack.
I’m calling the evacuation off, this was an utter failure.

Due to the sheer number of evacuees, it would take too long, plus we don’t have the resources for such a large scale EVAC.The civilians need to get off the planet immediately. Using these transports are our only option.
We can't do any more good here, the risk is too great. Forge, get your men back to a secure location and await further orders.
We have set up a Forward Command Center on top of the Arcadian Police Department. They have agreed to help out where they can.
Don’t leave the Transports unattended and out in the open, Covenant know we are going for them, and as such, get some defenses up around them.
It's our fault the Covenant are here, we need to help these civilians. Evacute Arcadia….
We will handle the civilians evacuations. You keep the Covenant off our backs!
Transport is boarding. Launch Transport when you are ready!
Listen up UNSC, here's where we are headed. Next group.
Everybody ! Listen up! We are going to Pad 1. Everyone to Pad 1! Maintain an orderly fashion!
Everybody ! Listen up! We are going to Pad 2. Everyone to Pad 2! Maintain an orderly fashion!
Everybody ! Listen up! We are going to Pad 3. Everyone to Pad 3! Maintain an orderly fashion!
This isn't working! We don't have time to guard one at a time. We are going to have to double up and do two runs at a time!
Times running out. Doubling up isn't enough. We are going all out, everyone! All pads ! Go now!
We are going to be spread pretty thin , we will need UNSC coverage!
Thanks for the assist UNSC, you have just saved many innocent lives
Respectfully sir, Why can’t we just use Pelicans? That seems like it would be way easier.
Rodger that. I still think Pelicans would be easier. Listen up, here's whats going to happen.
Arcadian PD is going to pick a transport for the civilians to run to. Once they reach a transport, the civilians will start to board. It's up to us to give them a safe passage.
I have asked Serina to hack control of the Transports launch cycles. We will be able to launch them whenever we need to.
Assuming nothing goes wrong with the evac, a transport will return to port to take on the next group.
We are going to be a pretty big blip on the Covenants radar so we need to hustle.
Baby sitting job is over, We've got to get ourselves out, everone, fall back
Time is running out. We are cutting this pretty close. Covenant reinforcements are undoubtabley on their way.
Allright, cargo is in. Light this fuse and lets get on with the rest of the civilians
Were cutting it pretty close. Step up the evacuation. Times running out.
We need to keep an eye on our forces. We don't want to be caught with our pants down when they come kncoking on our door.
We're no good to these peopl dead! Get some more men on the field!
You heard the lady. We've go tincoming! Make ready!
The fight is going to be on multipule fronts so be ready for that. We are going to want some fast movers out on the field.

Well , that was a hit we didn't want, the Reactor looks rather damaged. Any more rough movements or combat damage and it will go critical; this being something we don't want. At least not at THIS location.
Towing unit is lost! Reactor is rolling back down! Watch your toes!!
Use a Grizzly to drag it up those hills. Move one into position of the Core.
That FTL Reactor can only take some much of a beating, we are going to have to be gentle with it. No rough movements!
FTL Reactor readings are spiking! Take it easy!
Clear the way! FTL is cut free and slidding back!
Come on lads, put your backs into it, think of yourselfs as Egyptians, building the great pyramids
Reactor is spiking, keep it still for a moment, it need to cool down, I'll signal with the all clear.
Level area, give the reactor a rest.
Lights are green. Keep at it.
Reactor readings are down, operation Dumbo Drop can continue.
It should be noted that the act of dragging it alone will cause some spiking (bad) once you get to a level area, we are going to have to let it be for a spell.
Reactor is going critical. Boom. We all die.
Reactor is going critical. Boom. We all die.
Get a base of opperations up and running, I expect to see some resistance here.
Quick update, Engineering has uncoupled the FTL and strapped it to a repulser sled. I've ordered Pelicans to carry it up to the …Hang on…This isn't right..
…(Crackle)… This is Lucky Luci! Stabelizers out We can't carry her! Going down!! Clear the area, we are dropping cargo!! (dead radio)
With those Pelicans gone, we are going to have to hoof it up those hills. Drag the FTL Reactor kicking and screaming to the Space Elevator
It’s a heavy son-of-abitch , so use Grizzlies to drag its fat behind up those hills. They are the only thing with enough tourque to drag the damn thing.
FTL Core has been ruptured, its going critical. We loose.
Serina, can you call out any enrgy spikes from the Reactor? We don't want this thing blowing up in our faces.
Use that Grizzly to tow the FTL Reactorup to Space Elevator. Move it to the front of the Reactor.
If that Grizzly gets taken out on while its towing up the ramp, it's going to come barreling back and its not going to be pretty.
Once it reaches a level area of terrain, it will be safe from rolling back down the hill , thus averting any unnecessary jostling. Repeat - You need to get it to the level area
As the lady pointeds out, dragging it up the hill is going to generate some heat. Once we level off, we are going to have to let it cool down
Afraid of the dark are we?
I've marked several locations, where a turret defense line would be most effective
I would like to think I've got a bad feeling about this.
Last received transmissions seemed that of a rambling madman.
Something about creatures taking the dead, using them as hosts, assimilation or some such thing.
Life signs dipped then spiked widely. There is something really not right with all this. I don't like it.
Give me a sec to scan theses readings coming in, hold please…
Well, that’s new. These organisms are amazing.
At first glance, they appear a species of virulent, parasitic organisms that thrive by consuming other sentient life of sufficient biomass.
Database is coming up with nothing as far as their origins or really anything…
Heavy Ionization is interfering with Spirits weapon systems , otherwise we could nuke it from orbit ourselves.
I'm detecting a huge indeterminate bio masses down there. Spirit can not fire down as we don't know if that is us or the unknown hostiles.
Nuke's are primed and ready for your mark. Fire when ready.
Uh, guys. Something's coming your way. Something big.
Huge Transponders readings are coming from the surface.
Camp Whiskeys seems to have gone offline, I am not picking up any of there transponders, hold it, there they are. They seem to all be rolled into one location. That’s really …..Unusual.
I am very curious about this Forge , if you would be kind enough to send some men over to check it out, I would be grateful.
Command Center Pod release initiated, clear the area
Its, its like nothing I've ever seen before, they are dragging the dead out of the camp
I've jacked into Whiskeys mainframe and granted myself Admin rites to their silo. We now have control over the missiles.
We are going to need a staging area to locate that Covenant vessel.
Well, lets just hope it doesn't come to that.
I need you to send a team to Camp Whiskey , see what the hell is going on there and why no one is answering comms.
Hostile hands? We aren't reading any Covenant signatures, what hostiles?
We are granting you access to Spirits Havok Nuke system. It is unfortunate, and probably overkill, but you are going to have to take out each of the Fire Bases. It is the only way to be sure.
Establish a beach head on the surface, we need a staging area if we are to track that Covenant Vessel
Where's Omega going!? Serina, track their location, we need them
Serina, spin up the FTL and bring weapons system online. We are going to nuke the whole surface from orbit. It's the only way to be sure.
Its black as ink out here, we need some eyes up.
Spirit of Fire can’t send down the supplies needed until a turret line has gone up.
Take these units and get some turrets up. We have no idea what this planet has in store for us. I want to know if anything is sneaking up on us.
I’ll have the boys in Ops ping the Nav Map with the tactical locations we need t.
Forge here, turret perimeter is live, awaiting Command Center drop from Spirit of Fire, over.
Stow that chatter Lieutenant, we have a job to do. I don't care about any boogey men and things that go bump in the night.
We are the ones that bump BACK!
Make ready! Battle conditions, all stations!
I've got a bad feeling about this
Forge here! Camp Whiskey is compromised! Camp in hostile hands. Over!! Repeat. Whiskeys been compromised, unknown non Covenant hostile…!!!
Not Covenant Sir, something else, something worse. Much worse. And uglier.
By what looks to be UNSC Marines!!
Lieutenant Kane! Stand Down! What's wrong with you! What are you doing!!
Something's got a hold of these men, they are not themselves. Open fire!!
You sound like your in love with them, it’s a different story when you are seeing one face to face.
Whiskey can not be saved, it's infested by these things, they are infecting our Marines and buildings!
Sir! Recommend we take out the Fire Base before these things get into the other camps!
Sir! Recommend we take out all the Fire Bases before these things overrun us and have a chance to get onto Spirit.
Spartan Team Omega! Where are you going? Return to the fight. Over!
Spartans! What do you think you are doing!!?
Spartan Team Omega is considered AWOL or MIA, we are on our own here. This is were it gets interesting.
Lets get to that LZ! Move it!
It sucks, I know, but use the Nukes on the Fire Bases. These creatures can't be allowed to live.
Fire Base is breached. Go and assist those troops, we can't let it fall!
Fire Base is under attack. They are requesting assistance.
This is hopeless. Get your men and fall back to the marked LZ.
Spartan Team Omega will help our team get a Turret Perimeter up. Follow their lead.
Spartan Team Omega felt it necessary to scout the surounbding area, they appear to have gone dark. We haven't heard in from them for a few tics.
Camp Whiskey has gone dark. Send a team to check it out. I am sure its nothing.
Camp Whiskey 2nd Lieutenant Kane here, we are up and running at full capacity. We are requesting to have a Tactical Nuke sent down to our location.
Not sure about you guys, but I will feel safer knowing I have THAT card in my deck.
Camp Whiskey 2nd Lieutenant Kane here, Tactical Nuke is online. Anything looks at us sideways, they're vapor.
Sir, I hear funny things out there!! FUNNY THINGS!!!
I don't like this. It's quiet. Too quiet.
I can't see crap out here!!!
Get them off! Get them off me!!
Sir! We have incoming non-human, non covenant hostiles…
One of them bit me then ran off!! Is that bad?
This is crazy! Chaos has taken over the camp, everyone is shooting everyone!! Those things!! They’ve taken over!!! Get out of here!! Get out!!
I REALLY don't like this planet. Like, not at all.
I've got a bad feeling about this
Follow us , well watch over your men as they set up a defense line
Set up turrets here. Go now.
Hurry up, we don't have all day.
That will do. We need to get to the next one. Follow us.
All UNSC, fall back to the LZ. Repeat, all active UNSC need to fall back to the marked LZ and await dust off.
Spirit, this is Spartan Team Omega. We are leaving the battlefield. Situation appears to be in hand.
Spartan Team Omega , Inbound - We've found something. Or something's found us rather.
We are coming in , but we are coming in hot. Make ready! ETA is a few minutes!
Base, I can hold ‘em off for now, but not forever. I need those reinforcements!
Base, this is Forge. We’re under heavy fire…
Base, reinforcements are here. Clear the area so I can move Anders safely.
Base, I need covering fire over here!
Forge here, cover us, I’m getting Anders out of here.
We're pinned down near the back of the structure!
Hold them off while Anders rests for a moment…
I won't move Anders until the area is cleared of enemy units!
We’re at the next cover position…
Hunters! I need help with these guys.
Base? Can I get a little help here?
Forge here...we made it! Ready for extraction!
This is Forge. Cover me, we're falling back to the next cover position!
This is Forge. We're pinned down inside the Artifact. Anders is hurt...need assistance.....
This is Forge, it's over, I've lost Anders…
We’re taking too much enemy fire, you’ve got to keep them busy.
They’ve cut us off! The bridge is down!
We’re doubling back to the other bridge!
I cant move Anders until she's rested.
I’m detecting Covenant transports inbound near our base!
The Covenant forces are establishing a base west of our Command Center!
Covenant units are breaking though entrances we thought were sealed. Keep an eye on those doors in there.
Get ready for Covenant attacks from the surface. You’ve got to hold that position until Forge can get Anders out of there.
This is Cutter. Get some men in there and reenforce Forge's position! Get Anders out of there!
Hunters are heavily armored, get that Scorpion in there and help Forge take ‘em down.
The Covenant have surprised us and counterattacked. They've pinned down Forge and Anders inside the artifact. Get in there and escort them out.
Forge will not move Anders until the area is completely clear of enemy. Send units in there and clear a path for them.
A pelican is standing by to evac Forge and Anders once they reach the Relic entrance.
The Covenant are right on our ass, gentlemen! Keep moving!
That Covenant artillery is getting awfully close…
Get some turrets up. We've got to hold them off!
Something's transporting in behind us…watch out!
Lets get to that crater. Do not engage the enemy behind us! Keep moving!
We only have a little time to prep the base for the Covenant attacks, let’s get to it!
Nice work, you got my Scorpions here without a scratch.
Those Wraiths are closing in…once they're close enough they'll blow us to hell!
Clear the enemy out of this crater!
The Command Center is under attack! Defend it!
Let’s see what these Spartans can do. Push the Covenant back!
Covenant Mega Turret! We've got to take it out somehow!
I’ve found a suitable base location...it’s an impact crater a few clicks down the highway.
I've scanned the area, the best defendable location is an impact crater a few clicks south along the highway.
Covenant has flown in several Wraith tanks. They’re approaching the crater.
Spartan Team Omega is prepped and ready. Pelican is en route….
We’re dropping a Command Center in that crater for you.
I’ve contacted other UNSC forces in the area and informed them to retreat to your position.
Help is coming. Trust me, you wont be disappointed.
They're not very happy with us after helping those civilians escape.
Watch for enemy ambushes along the highway. Radio chatter indicates they know you're coming.
We cannot lose our foothold on Arcadia, gentlemen! Secure a defendable position and hold it until we can reinforce you.
Hold that Crater at all costs!
Help is on the way, do not lose that Command Center.
Ahaha, you are rushing too. This will be brutal.
Nice turrets, but what happens if I walk around them.
I guess you listened to my warning... I may have to suprise you next time.
I told you I would rush. You should have built some dudes sooner.
You built some defenses. Lets find out if they were enough.
Let's see if we can make a hole in that thing.
That didn’t even seem to scratch it!
Looks like we only shook the bee hive. We’ve got multiple ships incoming!
Serina is detecting a lot of activity in the Dome. Get some turrets up on this base asap.
Press $$A$$ on an open building socket then press $$A$$ while over the Reactor.
After analyzing the impact of the first Rhino, I believe having shells hit simultaneously should have an effect on the Dome. I’m still working the calculations on just how many.
You can now request a Rhino from the Pilar of Autumn at Landing Pad.
Use the $$Y$$ button to Lock-down a Rhino for a devastating attack
The Rhino has arrived! Get it to position Alpha.
Remember you can request more rhinos from the Landing Pad.
I'll take control of that Rhino to calibrate the shots.
These Rhinos are expensive, I've sent some ODSTs to help protect this one.
I've marked the Beta location. Request another Rhino and get it to that site.
We should take out those Covenant buildings that are reinforcing their position.
The Area is secure, get a Rhino in postion!
Rhinos in position and ready to Fire.
Looks like we are making some process!
We've got a lot more Dropships approaching!
We are going to need a Pelican to get there.
My calculations show that 2 more Rhinos will be necessary to open a hole big enough to get a Transport into the Dome.
I've marked the forth and fifth locations.
The Covenant must have figured out what we are doing. We will need a large force to take those locations!
Woo Hoo! Look at that. Let’s get a couple of Transports in there!
Let's show the Covenant who owns this place!
You have got to protect those Rhinos!
Oh man, there are thousands of them!

Captain Cutter, this is Spartan Team Omega….we are very close to taking out this infection mother out…but, it looks like we are a little pinned down and could use a diversion. I am sending you coordinates to three flood masses, hitting them that might get this thing's attention.
We've got to give the Spartans some relief so they can finish their mission.
I have received the Spartan coordinates to 3 pods, I've marked them on your nav computer.
Lets get a force in there, but be careful we don't know what this these things are capable of.
You better hurry taking out the other 2 pods, the first one is starting to regenerate!
Cutter, we are starting to run low on ammo. Any chance we will see some assistance soon?
Nice work, flood are moving away from the brain.
We are almost close enough to place the explosive!
Falling back, there are just too many of them!
Flood are everywhere, fall back, fall back!
Tactical nuke is set, blow it when ready!
The most direct path to the armor plate looks the toughest. We either ram straight ahead there, or we look for clever alternatives routes.
We have no more tactical nukes.
We have only one nuke left.
We've destroyed her main lasers, but she can still take us out with other attacks if we don't take her down first.
Just clear out those sensor jammers, and you can have your nuke.
The Spirit of Fire can't take too much more of this.
Some areas on the destroyer are protected by sensor jammers. To nuke those areas, you must first destroy the Jammer.
The destroyer's antigrav engine compartment armor is marked with a flashing target.
We have only a few more tactical nukes available for immediate launch.
The solution is her anti-grav engine, sir. It's shielded, but if we can destroy it's armor and get ground trooops inside, they should be able to destroy it.
Additional lasers are coming on line, but sensor jammers on their deck are blocking my targeting systems.
Captain, we do have a few tactical nukes loaded…
I'm scanning their energy readings... oh no! Their main weapon systems are back on line!
Our ships are drifting in parallel! It's gonna' get ugly for awhile.
The Spirit of Fire is going down - we've failed.
We've done it! Her anti-grav engine is destroyed - she's going down!
Then that's just what we're going to do. We'll use all available means to fight our way to that engine compartment, and destroy it's armor.
We can't outrun her, or outgun her. Serina, we need something else here.
Scramble the fighters - we've got to control the air!
Both ships took some damage from the collision.
The destroyer's Jammers are pyramid-shaped. Destroy them.
The enemy is transporting troops onto our hull! Clear them out!
This area of the ship is deadly for ground units. We may want to bring more aircraft here.
Transport an army onto their hull. Press forward!
Use aircraft to clear a beachhead!
We've reached the anti-grav compartment, but it will take a nuke to crack the armor plate over it.
We have a choice. Either destroy a few of those anti-ship lasers and buy ourselves some more time, or focus all our effort on reaching and destroying that engine compartment shielding.
The enemy has a lot of anti-air turrets in this area. We may want to transport ground units to fight here.
Another laser has come on line. It's only a matter of time before those lasers cut our ship apart. Move it!
I'm bringing some vehicles up on deck...
We need more Falcons, and we may want to upgrade some of our deck guns into missile turrets!
We're weakening it! It cannot turn it's head as quickly now.
The thing is just too powerful for a direct assault. We've go to start by destroying some of the nodes feeding it power.
That laser can chew right through these old structures, and if it gets to our Command Center? 'Mission failed'.
The stone buildings in this area will provide some cover, but not forever.
Before taking the bug on toe-to-toe, we can try to weaken it a bit by destroying some enemy-held power nodes.
So let's move it. Build up the base and get some vehicles in the queue! Consider the Scarab like a building in terms of how best to damage it.

Listen up! The Scarab's searchlight beam reveals it's facing. Get caught in that beam, and the bug will paint you with a targeting laser for a second. That laser is your "last call" before the main laser fires.
What the blazes?! Something just slagged two Rhino tanks!
Energy signature fading - the Scarab is nearly destroyed!
The Scarab's laser is beginning to cut through the cover protecting your base.
Some strange readings… Some of those nodes are guarded by cloaked elites!
I'll maintain a continuous scan so you can keep an eye on the Scarab - and it's searchlight.
And… The Scarab's field of fire prevents any hope of retreat or extraction.
It's immobile - unfinished - but it's head is fully operational, and it packs a laser like nothing we've seen before.
Hold it! - I'm detecting a huge power surge -
I'm picking up some Covenant activity near your position…
Your Command Center has been destroyed.
You've done it. The giant Scarab is destroyed!
Well, there it is. You've got to destroy that thing, before it destroys you.
You've advanced to 'ground zero'; where the Dome of Light stood. Take a look around.
The Scarab is drawing a lot of power from forerunner nodes in the area, for it's sub-systems.
We can claim some of the nodes we've cleared for our own power needs.
We're hurting it! Keep it up!
Keep training heavy tanks to blast away at that thing!
Our cover is nearly gone - we've got to take the Scarab down, and soon!
All enemy nodes have been destroyed - now we can focus everything on squashing that bug.
Think! We've got to use every tactic we can think of to damage that thing.
Build missile turrets or train some Wolverines to deal with that air assault.
Good work. It takes longer to rechage after firing, now.
Use cover as much as possible. I don't like my tanks in liquid form.
Find a way to open the door. You have 15 minutes.
Activate the second door across form this one.
One set of doors is open. Open the remaining 2 pairs of doors.
One pair of doors remain, open them to free the Spirit of Fire.
If we don't get that door open before the sun goes critical we're dead.
Activate the nodes at the edge of the door to reactivate them.
There must be some pattern to opening the doors.
The Forerunner lettering seems to be paired across 2 door sections. Maybe that's the key....
One set down, 2 more to go.
It seems you can activate only one pair of doors at a time
The Sentinels are attracted to the activated nodes. You're going to have to work quickly
It seems the Sentinels are more worried about the Flood than us. Get them to fight each other and we may buy ourselves some time.
The planet is tearing itself apart…keep an eye out for debris.
Good work! We may survive this after all….
The Sentinel AI is shutting the doors, it has enacted a planetwide alarm of some kind. The whole planet is locking down!
The Sentinels seem to be combining into larger forms. If this continues they may become unstoppable.
Flood infections detected near you area.
Debris is falling your way…look out!
What are they doing? They're combining!
Get that door open, we only have one shot at this!
We won’t be able to send any supplies this time. Requisition as much of an army as you can muster and get the door open.
You don’t have much time left, get those last doors open.
Ah perfect, there is a small Covenant outpost at that location. We better take that out first.
Get those things off of my ship!
Sentinel drones, attacking from the front!
Don't let them take out the generators.
All air-defenses to the bow! Stop those Sentinels.
Be advised, the ship is under attack from the bow and stern.
Get your infantry to repair those damaged airlocks!
Take that thing out. We've got to get the ship out of here
The ship is losing hull integrity! Repair those hatches!
We need to keep the ship moving. Find a way to disengage us.
If we lose all the airlocks we'll lose the ship.
The Spirit is stopping, some kind of docking mechanism has engaged…
Use that gantry, there should be a control panel on it.
The ship will move soon, get your men back on board.
I can’t believe we left them behind…
I'm detecting some sort of alarm from the planet's AI. Something's coming.
Releasing the Spirit must have triggered the installation's AI. Its not happy.
The Flood have found us. Destroy the conduits to cut them off.
A Large enemy object, scans indicate a large Sentinel variant, is approaching. Its blocking the exit.
That Sentinel is shielded. It will not take damage until the shields are neutralized.
I told you we'd make it.
Security barrier breached. High-order infection detected. Unidentified alien intrusion detected. Initiating Beta-3 defense protocols.
High order infection approaching sector zero. Inner biosphere threat. Possible reclaimer signature, undetermined. Deploying Stage 3 Enforcer.
Do not let all the airlocks be destroyed.
Release te ship from the docking clamp.
This is your base, we'll get back to it. For now, follow that Warthog.
Keep the Warthog selected and move the view to the next area.
Tell my wife I lov-- blearghrrgggrrrrrr!
Clean the Flood off of the hull.
Garrison your squads into the airlocks to protect them.
Construction vehicle capable of constructing a turret, note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
Construction vehicle capable of capturing a node, note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
Construction vehicle capable of constructing a new base, note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
Construction vehicle capable of constructing a turret, note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
Construction vehicle capable of capturing a node, note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
Construction vehicle capable of constructing a turret, note: vehicle is consumed in the process.
Are you sure you want to leave the party?
To play over Live, you need to be signed into Live. Would you like to sign in now?
Some players will be dropped from the party. Would you like to continue?
Saving content. Please do not turn off your Xbox 360.
This feature is not supported for this record game version.
Enter a description for your record game.
Use marines to destroy the glowing shield generator
Specialty infantry unit, expiramental robotic exo-suits with strong melee attack.
Leader of the brute forces, carries a gravity hammer able to stun and destroy heavy vehicles.
Now move the Warthog to this area.
Excellent. Look around, there are some Supply crates nearby.
Use the Warthog to collect the supply.
Warthogs and infantry can collect supplies from crates.
Okay, back to the base as promised.
Press $$DPAD$$ to jump to your base.
The base is where you spend Supply to build buildings and train units.
The Command Center is the hub of your base.
There are several building sockets that surround the Command Center. Select one now.
Cover Anders as she hacks the bridge controls.
Advance your forces north to the structure in the ice
Enter the structure and destroy the detonator
Click down on $$RS$$ to reset the camera
Use $$LS$$ to select the Scorpion Tank
Cancel building freeing the socket up.
Battle across frozen tundra to regain dominance over the planet Harvest.
Scout the area indicated by the smoke flares
Upgrade this building to level 2, units produced will start with 1 star of veterancy.
Upgrade this building to level 3, units produced will start with 2 stars of veterancy.
Upgrade this building to level 4, units produced will start with 3 stars of veterancy.
Marines use debris for COVER against snipers
Move Warthog near to RESCUE marines
Has a special attack that stuns and slows enemy units.
Scout drone that can cloak and has an expanding visibility range when stationary.
Air unit with a standard forerunner beam weapon
Has a special attack that stuns and slows enemy units.
Scout drone that can cloak and has an expanding visibility range when stationary.
Escape the chamber with Forge and Anders.
Press $$A$$ to construct a Scorpion Tank
Request a Rhino at the Landing Pad
Request a Rhino from the Pilar of Autumn at the Landing Pad
Plasma-based battle tank, slow speed but a powerful long-range attack once locked-down.
Objective Arrows point to your next objective
Press $$A$$ to construct a Supply Pad
Press and hold $$A$$ to Paint Select
ONE LESS SUN IN THE UNIVERSE
Outpost can train marines and heal
Move Anders to the other bridge's control panel.
Play with a random UNSC leader
Play with a random Covenant leader
Play with a random leader from either civ.
Clear out the remaining Covenant forces.
Move Anders to the landing pad.
Rhinos are ready to fire! I'm bringing up the targeting computer, now.
Whatever, first we need to generate some power. Build a Reactor.
Hello, anyone? I can't hold this position forever.
The situation is complex, sergeant. We're working on a plan now.
Wel it better get uncomplicated fast, Captain. Forge out.
Nothing says uncomplicate like a Scorpion.
Good work! Professor, I want to be briefed on your findings as soon as you're onboard.
Your failure here is not acceptable.
About time. I was down to my last clip.
No way I'm getting on that thing! I read the specs on it.
Cover me, I'm pulling back with Anders.
This control panel has been destroyed, its useless.
Get me to the control panel over there, I think I can get the second bridge working.
Watch that six, we're moving out!
I need a minute, maybe two!
You heard the lady, let's give her some privacy.
Hurry it up there, soldier. I'm missing lunch for this.
Secure the area by killing all Covenant in the crater.
It is awfully quiet here, maybe they already left.
We've got Alpha Platoon. Enroute to the LZ.
Sergeant, we're not gonna be able to lift this Elephant out.
Leave it. Get the men home.
Aye, Sir. We've got Bravo Platoon. Enroute to the LZ.
We've got Charlie Platoon. Enroute to LZ.
I think I can reactivate those bridge controls.
Look out, they're breaking through the doors!
Take it easy, we'll clean up this mess.
The Covenant are building some sort of structures to the north of our base!
Scans indicate the Covenant are building a large plasma weapon. You should take it out before it activates.
The Covenant are following you through the tunnels, Sergeant. Keep those men moving.
Select a socket $$A$$ to build more buildings
Select a building $$A$$ to see what units it trains
Low on supplies. Build more supply pads at your base.
Low on supplies. Gather crates with your units.
Barracks can build or upgrade infantry squads
Vehicle Depot can build or upgrade vehicles
Airpad can build or upgrade airplanes
